name: Serpent
overview: Welcome to the land of the Serpent competitions! In the distant future, the most popular one-on-one sport is Serpent. The players leap into their vehicles and take to the field... The tension mounts... Then the race is on! Play against the computer, or challenge another player via the Game Boy Video Link cable. To win, you must cut off the other player and surround them with your tail. The pulse-pounding action never stops! Are you up to the test of the Serpent competition?
